Recipes

  • Crispy Pancakes

    The extra milk makes these pancakes run a lot more, giving them really thin edges. When fried in oil, they become super crispy and very delicious.

  • Fluffy Pancakes

    These pancakes are fluffy and easily stackable. I like to eat them while they're cooking, instead of serving them all at once.

  • Pasta Dough

    Traditional dry pasta is made with only flour and water. Making fresh pasta only takes about an hour, and eggs add so much depth that you'd be happy to just eat it by itself.

  • Thick Chocolate Chip Cookies

    These cookies are based on cookies from a NYC bakery called Levain. They make them with walnuts but I think they're better without.

  • Tortillas

    These flour tortillas are simple to make, chewy, and delicious.
